author: National Geographic
description:
Uncover ancient civilization secrets and locate lost tombs with National Geographic in this MEGA episode compilation. Featuring four full episodes: 

Uncovering Herod's Lost Tomb
In 2006, archeologists thought they had discovered Herod's tomb. But today, startling new discoveries are adding pieces to the puzzle.

Secrets of Christ's Tomb
National Geographic tracks a team of experts as they race to repair the structure housing Christ’s tomb. Evidence of the tomb’s origins are revealed.

China's Megatomb: Secrets of the Terracotta Army
Albert Lin takes us on a journey to uncover the legends behind the First Emperor of China, through unprecedented access to his massive tomb site.

Flooded Tombs of the Nile
Archaeologists dive into a flooded pyramid near the Nile, to search for a king’s burial that could reveal clues about the ancient kingdom of Kush.

Explore the World with National Geographic subscriptions: https://natgeo.com/ytngmagazine
